column1: '''John D. Rateliff''' (b. [[1958]]<ref>[http://sacnoths.blogspot.com/2011/11/tonight-im-in.html Tonight I'm in . . .] at [http://sacnoths.blogspot.com/ Sacnoth's Scriptorium], dated 5 November 2011 (accessed 6 November 2011)</ref>) is a [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] scholar, who became well-known when publishing ''[[The History of The Hobbit]]'' in [[2007]]. He received his Ph.D from the [[Marquette University]] with a dissertation on [[Wikipedia:Edward Plunkett, 18th Baron of Dunsany
column2: Lord Dunsany]]. He lives in the [[Wikipedia:Seattle metropolitan area
column3: Seattle area]] and works as a professional editor.<ref>''[[The History of The Hobbit
column4: The History of The Hobbit: One-volume Edition]]'' (dustjacket information)</ref>
